Description:
Dear netwrix support
We have issue with Live update on server and I need offline patch for 5.9.4.1 version
This is our server in China, and the issue is well known with error: An error occurred. Hash does not match, and always we fix it with offline patch
Thank you in advance for your support
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Upgrade the server via Live update
What_We_Know__c:
Upgrade error for the version 5.9.4.1.
They requested an offline patch for it
Solution_Comment__c: Removed the error from the backend.
